Package com.barchart.udt.nio

java.nio - Style Programming API for UDT

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ChannelUDT convenience interface shared by client and server
 

Class Summary
AdapterInputStreamUDT InputStream implementation for UDT sockets.
AdapterOutputStreamUDT OutputStream for UDT sockets.
AdapterServerSocketUDT  
AdapterSocketUDT  
ChannelDatagramUDT TODO
ChannelServerSocketUDT you must use SelectorProviderUDT.openServerSocketChannel() to obtain instance of this class; do not use JDK ServerSocketChannel.open();
ChannelSocketUDT you must use SelectorProviderUDT.openSocketChannel() to obtain instance of this class; do not use JDK SocketChannel.open();
SelectionKeyUDT selection key implementation <> FIXME think again about concurrency
SelectorProviderUDT selection provider for UDT
SelectorUDT selector
 

Enum Summary
KindUDT UDT channel role type.
